author: cmpilato
msg: Revert r29004, which I made because I was under the impression that
the merge of the reintegrate branch into trunk brought with it the
salvation of libsvn_fs_base from sqlite bondslavery.  I was wrong.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_base/fs.c
(base_create): Create sqlite indexes for BDB repositories.
(base_hotcopy): Copy sqlite indexes for BDB repositories.

author: cmpilato
msg: Whitespace, formatting, and minor comment tweaks only.

author: cmpilato
msg: Now that libsvn_fs_base doesn't use sqlite for anything, it can stop
creating and copying sqlite indexes.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_base/fs.c
(base_create): Stop creating sqlite indexes for BDB repositories.
(base_hotcopy): Stop copying sqlite indexes for BDB repositories.

author: hwright
msg: Decrease the scope of a function.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/log.c
(svn_repos__get_path_mergeinfo): Move from here...
* subversion/libsvn_repos/rev_hunt.c
(get_path_mergeinfo): ...to here.
(get_merged_path_revisions): Update caller.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/repos.h
(svn_repos__get_path_mergeinfo): Remove.

author: hwright
msg: Avoid returning random data in the Perl bindings.
* subversion/bindings/swig/perl/libsvn_swig_perl/swigutil_pl.c
(svn_swig_pl_info_receiver): Return a value from this non-void function.
Patch by: Olaf Hering <olh@suse.de>
